conbody.p: Referencing is an effective means of content reuse in DITA. Content reuse is available at different levels (elements, topics, maps) by means of different types of references.

Instead of repeating some information, you can reuse it one of these ways with the help of a reference:
Point to a target
To point to a target, use these references:
Xref
Related links
Transclude the content of a target
To transclude the content of a target, use conref .
Include a topic or a map in multiple maps
To include a topic or a map in a map, use topicref .

note.p: All editions of Serna support DITA. However, DITA usability tools (DITA dialogs available through the DITA menu and the DITA toolbar), which facilitate the insertion of common DITA constructs, and reference navigation are available in Serna Enterprise Edition only.
